item.description:
James Daniels will give a basic demo of using the new framework followed by more in-depth exploration guided by audience interest. Russ Jones will introduce the topic of unobtrusive javascript and demonstrate its usage in Rails 3.

About ME-RUBYug: The TechMaine Ruby Group meets monthly, on the third Wednesday of the month, at 6:00 p.m.. Meetings are held at the TechMaine Technology Center, 506 Main Street, Westbrook, Maine. No charge; open to the public.

Door Prize: Each month registered attendees are entered in a door prize drawing, usually a newly released book. FMI: Please Visit the ME-RUBYUG page or contact us.

Please register to attend on the TechMaine site so that we can notify you if there is a change in schedule, and so your name will be in the drawing for the door prize.

http://www.techmaine....

group.name: The Portland Maine Ruby Meetup Group

item.name: Rails 3 Presentation - with James Daniels and Russ Jones
